data.lyric:
[ti:Forever After All]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Forever After All - Luke Combs
[00:04.34]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Drew Parker/Robert Williford
[00:08.68]Composed by：Luke Combs/Drew Parker/Robert Williford
[00:13.02]A cold beer's got twelve ounces
[00:15.92]A good truck's got maybe three hundred thousand
[00:19.11]You only get so much until it's gone
[00:26.08]Duracells in a Maglite
[00:29.21]A needle drop on a forty-five
[00:31.73]All the kinda things that only last so long
[00:37.98]When the new wears off and they get to getting old
[00:44.63]Sooner or later time's gonna take its toll
[00:49.93]They say nothing lasts forever
[00:53.32]But they ain't seen us together
[00:56.69]Or the way the moonlight dances in your eyes
[01:02.82]Just a t-shirt in the kitchen
[01:06.04]With no make-up and a million
[01:09.10]Other things that I could look at my whole life
[01:15.90]A love like that makes a man have second thoughts
[01:21.76]Maybe some things last forever after all
[01:31.42]The FM station on the outskirts
[01:34.79]Blue jeans after years of shift work
[01:37.91]All fading out like I always knew they would
[01:44.47]The strings on this guitar
[01:47.62]The first love lost on a young heart
[01:50.74]Those things are gonna break after the getting's good
[01:57.00]'Cause the new wears off and they get to getting old
[02:03.03]Yeah sooner or later time's gonna take its toll
[02:09.45]They say nothing lasts forever
[02:12.31]But they ain't seen us together
[02:15.70]Or the way the moonlight dances in your eyes
[02:21.64]Just a t-shirt in the kitchen
[02:25.02]With no make-up and a million
[02:28.34]Other things that I could look at my whole life
[02:34.80]A love like that makes a man have second thoughts
[02:40.75]Maybe some things last forever after all
[02:56.63]They say nothing lasts forever
[02:59.67]But they ain't seen us together
[03:02.92]Or the way the moonlight dances in your eyes
[03:08.99]And I know there'll be that moment
[03:12.37]The good Lord calls one of us home and
[03:16.24]One won't have the other by their side
[03:22.59]But Heaven knows it that won't last too long
[03:28.25]Maybe some things last forever after all
[03:37.74]After all
data.trans:
[ti:Forever After All]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.34]//
[00:08.68]//
[00:13.02]一杯冰啤酒有十二盎司重
[00:15.92]一辆卡车可能有三十万盎司重
[00:19.11]你能拥有的只有这么多 最后都会消失的
[00:26.08]镁光手电筒中的金霸王电池
[00:29.21]落在唱片上的唱针
[00:31.73]这些东西只能存在这么久
[00:37.98]新的事物终将慢慢变成旧的
[00:44.63]时间迟早会磨灭一切的
[00:49.93]常言道 没有什么是永恒不变的
[00:53.32]但他们没有见过我们在一起的样子
[00:56.69]也没见过月光在你眼里闪烁的模样
[01:02.82]在厨房里 穿着T恤
[01:06.04]没有化妆 没有过多修饰
[01:09.10]却感觉我这一生可以欣赏的地方有好多好多
[01:15.90]那样的爱情让一个男人都开始怀疑
[01:21.76]也许有些东西真的可以永远不变
[01:31.42]郊区的广播
[01:34.79]穿了多年的蓝色牛仔裤
[01:37.91]都在渐渐消失 就好像我一直知道它们会消失
[01:44.47]吉他上的弦
[01:47.62]年轻人心中遗忘的初恋
[01:50.74]这些东西到了最后都会渐渐磨灭
[01:57.00]因为新的事物终究会慢慢变成旧的
[02:03.03]时间迟早会磨灭一切的
[02:09.45]常言道 没有什么是永恒不变的
[02:12.31]但他们没有见过我们在一起的样子
[02:15.70]也没见过月光在你眼里闪烁的模样
[02:21.64]在厨房里 穿着T恤
[02:25.02]没有化妆 没有过多修饰
[02:28.34]却感觉我这一生可以欣赏的地方有好多好多
[02:34.80]那样的爱情让一个男人都开始怀疑
[02:40.75]也许有些东西真的可以永远不变
[02:56.63]常言道 没有什么是永恒不变的
[02:59.67]但他们没有见过我们在一起的样子
[03:02.92]也没见过月光在你眼里闪烁的模样
[03:08.99]我知道总有一天
[03:12.37]上帝会将我们其中一个带回家
[03:16.24]我们终究会分离 无法再相守
[03:22.59]但是天知道 那样的情形不会持续太久
[03:28.25]也许有些东西真的可以永远不变
[03:37.74]终究不会变
